name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Miami Airport East

reviews.text: Myself husband and 7 yo daughter stayed here for one night 2nd April 2008. We picked this hotel as we needed onenight near to airport as we arrived late evening and didnt want to drive to orlando until the next day. Room seemed tired shabby and not that clean it also had a smokey smell. Bfast was ok but nothing special , staff a bit off hand but we generally experienced rather off hand folk in Miami ! It suited our purpose for one night but its not a place we would return too.
reviews.title: hhmm could be better

reviews.text: My daughter, granddaughter and I stayed at this hotel prior to a cruise out of Miami. I always read reviews on TripAdvisor website before I book a hotel, especially in Miami, because they vary widely, and trusted the positive reviews. We were just delighted with this hotel. The rooms were very nicely furnished and didn't seem like a budget hotel. We enjoyed the pool and the breakfast. The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. The best part was the price was very reasonable, hard to find in Miami. I would enthusiastically recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

reviews.text: we stayed at this hotels for two nights before the Bahama cruise . The reason I chose this hotel is its great location. we rent a car to visit Everglade nation park the day before the cruise. it is very close to many car rental companys, enterprise car rental office is within walking distance . we took the enterprise shuttle from the airport to rent the car upon arriving Miami at 10: 30pm . it only take 2 minute drive from enterprise office to the hotel. there is a good restaraunt right next door and its kitchen closed at 12am . if you arrive late in Miami and just want a one night stay . this hotel will be a good choice.
reviews.title: great location but quite noisy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a room on 4th floor for the first night. it was a horrible experience. The airplanes were flying over our room every 5 min from 6 am. we can hear the the thunderstorm very loud at night too.( I think the insulation under the roof is way too thin)
reviews.title: Just What I Needed

likes.disliked: — It was quite busy at breakfast/shuttle time--however, probably that is unavoidable.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I requested to switch to 2nd floor next morning. I had much better sleep the 2nd night but you can still hear the airplane noise though.
reviews.title: Perfect for a one nighter

likes.liked: — Free shuttle to the Port of Miami, no charge for parking and leaving car (The only hotel to do this in Miami)

aka: La Quinta Inn Miami Airport East Hotel Miami
